General.Name: DR Corporation Limited
General.Description: DR Corporation Limited produces and sells diamond jewelry worldwide. It offers engagement rings, wedding rings, and love gifts. The company sells its products through stores, as well as its website. DR Corporation Limited was founded in 2010 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China.
General.Address: Block C, China Resources Land Building, Shenzhen, China, 518063
